info.title: QuickBooks Accounts API
info.description: Read and query account records from QuickBooks Online.

parameters.name: realmId
parameters.description: The QuickBooks company ID

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: SQL-like query to fetch Account, Bill, BillPayments, Customers etc. (e.g. `select * from Account`, `select * from Bill`, `select * from BillPayment`, `select * from Customer`, `select * from Customer maxresults 2 startposition 1`)

QueryBills.description: Fetch Bill records with maxresults and startposition

QueryBillPayments.description: Fetch BillPayment records with maxresults and startposition

QueryBillPaymentsByLastUpdatedTime.description: Fetch BillPayment records updated after a specific timestamp, ordered by LastUpdatedTime
QueryBillPaymentsByLastUpdatedTime.value: select * from BillPayment Where Metadata.LastUpdatedTime>'2014-12-12T14:50:22-08:00' Order By Metadata.LastUpdatedTime

QueryCustomers.description: Fetch Customer records with maxresults and startposition

QueryCustomersByLastUpdatedTime.description: Fetch Customer records updated after a specific timestamp, ordered by LastUpdatedTime
QueryCustomersByLastUpdatedTime.value: select * from Customer Where Metadata.LastUpdatedTime>'2014-12-12T14:50:22-08:00' Order By Metadata.LastUpdatedTime

QueryVendors.description: Fetch Vendor records with maxresults and startposition

QueryVendorsByLastUpdatedTime.description: Fetch Vendor records updated after a specific timestamp, ordered by LastUpdatedTime
QueryVendorsByLastUpdatedTime.value: select * from Vendor Where Metadata.LastUpdatedTime>'2014-12-12T14:50:22-08:00' Order By Metadata.LastUpdatedTime

QueryInvoices.description: Fetch Invoice records with maxresults and startposition

QueryInvoicesByLastUpdatedTime.description: Fetch Invoice records updated after a specific timestamp, ordered by LastUpdatedTime
QueryInvoicesByLastUpdatedTime.value: select * from Invoice Where Metadata.LastUpdatedTime>'2014-12-12T14:50:22-08:00' Order By Metadata.LastUpdatedTime

QueryTaxAgency.description: Fetch TaxAgency records with maxresults and startposition

QueryPayments.description: Fetch Payment records with maxresults and startposition

QueryItems.description: Fetch Item records with maxresults and startposition

QueryCompanyInfo.description: Fetch CompanyInfo records with maxresults and startposition

QueryEmployees.description: Fetch Employee records with maxresults and startposition

QueryClass.description: Fetch Class records with maxresults and startposition

QueryDepartments.description: Fetch Department records with maxresults and startposition

QueryJournalEntries.description: Fetch JournalEntry records with maxresults and startposition

QueryEstimates.description: Fetch Estimate records with maxresults and startposition

get.description: Retrieves a single TaxAgency object by ID.

parameters.description: ID of the TaxAgency object

get.description: Retrieves a single Payment object by ID.
Fetches the full details of an item (Inventory, Group/Bundle, Category, Service, or NonInventory) using the Item ID.
Retrieves a single Employee object by ID.

401.description: Unauthorized. Token may be missing or expired.

parameters.name: realmId
parameters.description: The QuickBooks company ID

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date of the report, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date of the report, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: accounting_method
parameters.description: The accounting method used in the report.

parameters.name: customer
parameters.description: Filters report contents to include information for specified customers. One or more comma separated customer IDs.

parameters.name: qzurl
parameters.description: Specifies whether Quick Zoom URL information should be generated for rows in the report.

parameters.name: date_macro
parameters.description: Predefined date range.

parameters.name: adjusted_gain_loss
parameters.description: Specifies whether unrealized gain and losses are included in the report.

parameters.name: class
parameters.description: Filters report contents to include information for specified classes. One or more comma separated class IDs.

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: Filters report contents to include information for specified items. One or more comma separated item IDs.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: The sort order.

parameters.name: summarize_column_by
parameters.description: The criteria by which to group the report results.

parameters.name: department
parameters.description: Filters report contents to include information for specified departments. One or more comma separated department IDs.

parameters.name: vendor
parameters.description: Filters report contents to include information for specified vendors. One or more comma separated vendor IDs.

parameters.name: minorversion
parameters.description: The minor version of the API.

401.description: Unauthorized. Token may be missing or expired.

time.description: The server timestamp of the response
